channel.title: Random Crash with Minidump
channel.description: Security guard just told me to clear my dance card, and I ran up to grab some ammo. I ran back, then decided to re-check to see what ammunition was available to decide which gun to run forward with. As I ran up to the Magnum on the hook the game just up and crashed. Map is: bm_c2a2b (I'd just happened to grab a getpos to try something else later). (Too bad you guys don't have a bugtracker or a github or something.) My computer: [url]https://www.asus.com/Notebooks/Gaming_Powerhouse/G73SW/#specifications[/url] I have the i7 model. hl2_4104_crash_2012_9_16T9_52_42C0.mdmp (107 KB)

item.title: Random Crash with Minidump
item.dc:creator: AutoDMC
item.description:
Being chased by the second gargantua I decided to just make a run for it and leave a line of laser mines along the way. When I got to the partially open doors at the end of the tunnel with the Security Guard outside the game started to stutter then it died.
hl2_4104_crash_2012_9_17T9_18_0C0.mdmp (107 KB)

Read full topic

item.title: Random Crash with Minidump
item.dc:creator: AutoDMC
item.description:
Another random crash. I believe this one was on a map switch.

EDIT: Actually, the map was bm_c2a4c and it was just as I fell into the radioactive room (
setpos -927.479736 -2320.015869 -471.968750;setang -11.025911 -84.407860 0.000000). Captured the location on my reload.
hl2_4104_crash_2012_9_16T13_59_15C0.mdmp (108 KB)

Read full topic

item.title: Random Crash with Minidump

item.description:
Security guard just told me to clear my dance card, and I ran up to grab some ammo. I ran back, then decided to re-check to see what ammunition was available to decide which gun to run forward with. As I ran up to the Magnum on the hook the game just up and crashed.

Map is: bm_c2a2b (I’d just happened to grab a getpos to try something else later).

(Too bad you guys don’t have a bugtracker or a github or something.)

My computer: https://www.asus.com/Notebooks/Gaming_Powerhouse/G73SW/#specifications I have the i7 model.
